intro.description:
In addition to plotting your recorded vehicle data, Debrief is able to show a number of datasets in backdrop form.
These range from Vectored datasets such as VPF through to gridded datasets such as ETOPO-2

item.title: How to configure library datasets
item.description: The steps to configure VPF and Etopo are covered in Debrief's user manual. If you wish to learn this at this stage, use the help link below, else search for VPF in Debrief's online help at some future stage.
